amendment.description: To reauthorize the Secure Rural Schools and Community Self-Determination Act of 2000.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 104 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 104 proposed by Senator Wyden to Amendment SA 100. (consideration: CR S1022-1024; text: CR S1022) To reauthorize the Secure Rural Schools and Community Self-Determination Act of 2000.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 104 proposed by Senator Wyden to Amendment SA 100.
